palette.title: standing here*
palette.description: I took this photo for my dear friend Julee. My feet last week, I was looking at this kistchy modern floor from the mondrian hotel in miami beach and thought "Julee would love this"! :* Use Link: http://www.colourlovers.com/lover/Julee

palette.title: mondrian
palette.description: In honour of Piet Mondrian, one of my favourite artists who contributed greatly to the Dutch De Stijl movement in the early 1900's... His compositions were of simple forms derived from the use of black, white and the three primary colours.
